TCallback Class

Summary

Adapts class instance (object) method as standard callback function.

Namespace: Spring.Utils
Inheritance Hierarchy
TInterfacedObject
  Spring.Utils.TCallback
Syntax
Delphi
type
 TCallback = class(TInterfacedObject, TCallbackFunc)
 end;

The TCallback type exposes the following members.

Constructors
Show:
 NameDescription
Create(TObject,Pointer)

Initializes a new instance of the TCallback class.

Destroy

Represents the destructor of the TCallback class.

Top
Methods
Show:
 NameDescription
Invoke

Represents method Invoke.

Top
Remarks

Both the object method and the callback function need to be declared as stdcall.

Examples

This sample shows how to call CreateCallback method.

Code
private
  fCallback: TCallbackFunc;
//...
fCallback := CreateCallback(Self, @TSomeClass.SomeMethod);
